channel.title: Console Commands & Settings Not Applying
channel.description:
This may belong in bug reporting, bit new here, so let me know. I had been running the game flawlessly up until "Power Up" with the nostalgia sound package from steam workshop downloaded, when I ran into an issue. The AI became disabled, I tried to enter some console commands to restart AI, but to no avail. So, I uninstalled and re-installed the game.
Now, none of my installed workshop mods are working (all for sound) and snd_restart doesn't seem to have any effect. In addition to this, my settings are locked in the options menu; I cannot turn off fast weapon swap (I'm clicking apply after every try) or change some of my key assignments. While trying to test it out, I changed my move forward key from W to G and after clicking apply, both keys performed the same function (though I was able to remove G as the forward key).
Last bit, when I have the developer console open, it pops in this line every second or so:
Ignoring unreasonable position (-950.346497,-433.009644,-1030704.562500) from vphysics! (entity weapon_shotgun)
Any ideas? Did I break the game?

item.title: Console Commands & Settings Not Applying
item.dc:creator: Shrike1991
item.description:
This may belong in bug reporting, bit new here, so let me know. I had been running the game flawlessly up until “Power Up” with the nostalgia sound package from steam workshop downloaded, when I ran into an issue. The AI became disabled, I tried to enter some console commands to restart AI, but to no avail. So, I uninstalled and re-installed the game.

Now, none of my installed workshop mods are working (all for sound) and snd_restart doesn’t seem to have any effect. In addition to this, my settings are locked in the options menu; I cannot turn off fast weapon swap (I’m clicking apply after every try) or change some of my key assignments. While trying to test it out, I changed my move forward key from W to G and after clicking apply, both keys performed the same function (though I was able to remove G as the forward key).

Last bit, when I have the developer console open, it pops in this line every second or so:

Ignoring unreasonable position (-950.346497,-433.009644,-1030704.562500) from vphysics! (entity weapon_shotgun)

Any ideas? Did I break the game?
